title: Hardest Road Worlds Ever? Rwanda Reveals Crushing Climb-Loaded Courses for 2025 UCI World Championships
content:
Huge elevation gain and hints of high altitude on tap for historic first African road worlds in September 2025.

Read the full article at Hardest Road Worlds Ever? Rwanda Reveals Crushing Climb-Loaded Courses for 2025 UCI World Championships on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
